author: Chuang Tzu
message: When deeds and words are in accord, the whole world is transformed.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mother Teresa
message: Kind words can be short and easy to speak but their echoes are truly endless.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Blake
message: For everything that lives is holy, life delights in life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: The most important thing is transforming our minds, for a new way of thinking, a new outlook: we should strive to develop a new inner world.
title: Thought of the day
